markdown.markdown:
Dr. Fernanda Krupek

Assistant Professor - Urban Food Systems
20% Teaching \| 30% Research \| 50% Extension
krupek.1@osu.edu \| (330) 263-8039
Office: Williams Hall (110A) \| Wooster Campus

Fernanda is a professor at the Ohio State University College of Food Agricultural and Environmental Sciences...Please access [my profile](https://hcs.osu.edu/our-people/dr-fernanda-krupek) at the Department of Horticulture and Crop Science website to know more about me.
